Package com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.cpu

Class CPUTimings

java.lang.Object
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.cpu.CPUTimings
public class CPUTimings extends Object
This class is for handling all the time-related CPU tasks, like adhering to clock cycle frequencies and decrementing delay and sound timers.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static final int
    NANOS_FREQUENCY
    The number of nanoseconds in a second.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    CPUTimings(CPUSpeed speed, CPUState state)
    Create a new CPUTimings set at a certain speed.

    Method
    Description
    void
    finishCycle(long startTime)
    Wait until the end of the CPU clock cycle.
    void
    handleTimers()
    Decrement the delay and sound timers at a rate of 60hz per second.

      protected static final int NANOS_FREQUENCY
      The number of nanoseconds in a second.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • CPUTimings

      public CPUTimings(CPUSpeed speed, CPUState state)
      Create a new CPUTimings set at a certain speed.
      Parameters:
      speed - The speed of the CPU.
      state - The CPUState being used by the CPU.

  • Method Details

    • finishCycle

      public void finishCycle(long startTime)
      Wait until the end of the CPU clock cycle.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start of the current clock cycle, in nanoseconds.

    • handleTimers

      public void handleTimers()
      Decrement the delay and sound timers at a rate of 60hz per second. If it's been a longer duration such that they should be decremented more than once, they will be. If it hasn't been long enough to be decremented at all, then they won't be.
